C

ChronologicalLogger - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
The ChronologicalLogger class provides a centralized logging mechanism that maintains a chronological queue of log records.

Library - Class in pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1
Library class represents shared resource where multiple threads (readers and writers) interact.

S

stopThreads() - Method in class pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.Library
